From the brand

FOR YOUR BEST PET FRIENDS

Shop Our Best Sellers

Shop Our Best Sellers

About Luciphia

Pets are our best friends, and we do our best to provide them with the best care and attention.

Luciphia was founded with a clear purpose – for your best pet friends.

Luciphia finds a variety of fabrics and designs them carefully to provide your pet friends with blankets and beds in a variety of styles and functions. Create a warm and cozy home for your pet friends with warm and soft blankets and beds to enjoy your pet time!

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 23 x 16 x 1 inches; 8 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TZ-SANTIAO
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 4, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ luciphia
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07G8B746Q
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

MATERIAL: 100% microfiber and soft sherpa fleece(polyester). The blankets are made of ultra-soft extravagant fabric.
EASY TO WASH/CLEAN: 100% machine washable. The blankets not only look elegant, it is also easy to clean and dry. It can be utilized as a cover or quilt for dogs, cats and other pets.
USAGE: Protect furniture from scratching and pet hair. Cute and lovely paw print design. No pilling, skin-friendly, perfect for the couch, sofa, bed and pet carrier.
EASY TO CARRY: The blankets are soft and lightweight. It’s perfect to take it to participate in outdoor activities, such as traveling, camping, and picnic. Keep your pets warm and cozy during sleeping in the outdoors.

About Luciphia

Pets are our best friends, and we do our best to provide them with the best care and attention.

Luciphia was founded with a clear purpose – for your best pet friends.

Luciphia finds a variety of fabrics and designs them carefully to provide your pet friends with blankets and beds in a variety of styles and functions. Create a warm and cozy home for your pet friends with warm and soft blankets and beds to enjoy your pet time!

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TZ-IUYL240
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 28, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ luciphia
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07BGWTSX6
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

MATERIAL: 100% double-sided coral velvet textures (polyester).The blankets are made of ultra-soft extravagant fabric.
EASY TO WASH/CLEAN: 100% machine washable. The blankets not only look elegant, it is also easy to clean and dry. It can be utilized as a cover or quilt for dogs, cats and other pets.
USAGE: Protect furniture from scratching and pet hair. Cute and lovely paw print design. No pilling, skin-friendly, perfect for the couch, sofa, bed and pet carrier.
EASY TO CARRY: The blankets are soft and lightweight. It’s perfect to take it to participate in outdoor activities, such as traveling, camping, and picnic. Keep your pets warm and cozy during sleeping in the outdoors.

Soft and Comfortable

  • Top soft flannel with attractive designs.
  • Soft coral fleece never irritates your pet’s skin.

Durable and Exquisite

  • Premium fleece and strong stitching ensure great durability.
  • Available in 3 sizes to fit any pet crate.

Easy Care

  • Machine washable, no shape changing after each washing.
  • Conveniently hand and machine washable for a hassle-free clean.
